description: Data quality monitoring for completeness, accuracy, timeliness, and consistency. Automated data quality rules. Exception reporting and remediation tracking.

name: Database Administration Controls
description: Database security hardening, access control, backup/recovery, and performance monitoring. DBA privileged access governed by PAM.

name: Responsible AI Model Governance
description: AI model risk assessment, bias testing, explainability requirements, and deployment governance per Rackspace AI governance framework. President of AI/Technology/Sustainability oversight.

name: Corporate Governance Oversight Controls
description: Board of Directors oversight of enterprise risk including cybersecurity. Audit Committee charter. Board-level cybersecurity briefings per SEC requirements. Director independence requirements.

name: Customer DPA Technical Enforcement
description: Technical controls implementing Customer Data Processing Addendum terms: data localization, access restrictions, deletion upon termination, subprocessor notification. com/information/legal/dpa, pol-007.

name: Website Terms of Use Technical Controls
description: Technical enforcement of website terms: bot detection, scraping prevention, rate limiting, ToS acceptance gates. com/information/legal/websiteterms, pol-089.

name: MSA Contractual Security Controls
description: Technical and operational controls implementing Master Services Agreement security terms. Service Order + MSA + Product Terms framework enforcement. Security SLA monitoring.

name: Related Party Transaction Monitoring
description: Monitoring and disclosure controls for related party transactions per SEC requirements and corporate governance standards. Board approval thresholds. Quarterly review.

name: UK Tax Strategy Compliance Controls
description: Tax governance controls implementing UK Finance Act 2016 requirements. Annual UK Tax Strategy publication. Transfer pricing documentation. Tax risk assessment. com/information/legal/uktaxstrategy, pol-008.

name: EEO and Anti-Discrimination Controls
description: Equal employment opportunity enforcement controls. Hiring process compliance. Complaint investigation procedures. EEO data tracking and reporting.

name: Anti-Harassment Investigation Procedures
description: Formal investigation procedures for harassment and workplace conduct complaints. Confidential reporting. Third-party investigation for escalated cases. Disciplinary actions.

name: Brand and Communications Governance Controls
description: Brand usage governance including logo standards, naming conventions, and communication templates. Brand compliance review for external communications.

name: Travel and Expense Approval Controls
description: Travel and expense controls: pre-approval for travel, expense limits, receipt requirements, automated expense reporting, manager approval workflows.

name: Compensation and Benefits Administration Controls
description: Compensation controls: salary band adherence, equity grant approval process, benefits enrollment verification. Segregation of duties in payroll processing.

name: Virtualization Security Controls (SC-V)
description: Hypervisor hardening per CIS Benchmarks. VM escape prevention. Virtual network isolation. Guest-to-guest isolation enforced.

name: Container Security Controls
description: Container image scanning, runtime protection, orchestration security. Base image management. Registry access control.

name: API Gateway Security Controls
description: API gateway providing rate limiting, authentication, request validation, and traffic management for customer and internal APIs. OAuth 2.0 enforcement. rackspace.com, pol-069.

name: Secure DNS Resolution (SC-20/22)
description: Authoritative DNS with integrity protection. Recursive resolution with validation. DNSSEC where applicable. Redundant DNS architecture.

name: Annual Red Team Exercise (RA-RT)
description: Annual Red Team exercise per FedRAMP Rev 5 requirement. Simulates real attacker TTPs. Extends beyond standard penetration testing. Results feed into control improvements and POA&M.

name: External Penetration Testing
description: Annual external penetration testing of internet-facing systems. Performed by qualified third party. Findings remediated per severity-based SLAs. Evidence for FedRAMP and PCI DSS. 4.

name: Internal Vulnerability Assessment
description: Internal vulnerability scanning on defined schedule. Authenticated scanning of managed infrastructure. Prioritized remediation per CVSS and business context.

name: Cloud Account Governance
description: Cloud provider account governance: root account protection, IAM policy management, billing alert configuration, CloudTrail/audit logging. Applied across AWS, Azure, GCP customer environments.

name: Cloud Workload Protection
description: Runtime protection for cloud workloads including server and container protection. CrowdStrike Falcon extended to cloud environments. Cloud-native monitoring integration.

name: Data Governance Framework Controls
description: Enterprise data governance framework: data ownership, stewardship, quality standards, and lifecycle management. Data governance committee oversight.

name: Environmental Sustainability Monitoring
description: Environmental controls implementing sustainability commitments: energy usage monitoring, waste management, carbon emissions tracking. Annual CDP disclosure since 2011.

name: Cross-Border Data Transfer Mechanism Validation
description: Ongoing validation that cross-border data transfer mechanisms remain legally valid. Standard Contractual Clauses in DPA. Adequacy decision monitoring. Transfer impact assessments.

name: FedRAMP Continuous Monitoring — Monthly Scanning
description: Monthly OS and database vulnerability scanning per FedRAMP ConMon requirements. Results submitted to FedRAMP PMO. POA&M updated.

name: FedRAMP Continuous Monitoring — Annual Assessment
description: Annual third-party assessment by accredited 3PAO. Control testing per FedRAMP test cases. SAR and POA&M submitted.

name: FedRAMP Continuous Monitoring — Quarterly Reporting
description: Quarterly POA&M reporting, significant change reporting, and continuous monitoring deliverables to FedRAMP PMO and JAB.

name: Automated Threat Detection Rules
description: Splunk predefined and custom correlation rules for automated threat detection. Rules tuned based on false positive analysis and emerging threats. Mapped to MITRE ATT&CK framework.

name: SOC Escalation and Triage Procedures
description: Defined escalation tiers and triage procedures for security events. Severity-based response SLAs. Automated enrichment of alerts with threat intelligence context.

name: Forensic Investigation Procedures
description: Digital forensic investigation procedures for security incidents. Evidence collection, chain of custody, analysis, and reporting. CrowdStrike partnership for major investigations.

name: Malware Analysis Capability
description: Malware analysis capability for suspicious files and indicators. CrowdStrike Falcon sandbox analysis. Automated detonation and behavioral analysis. Results feed into detection rules.

name: Customer Shared Responsibility Delineation
description: Clear delineation of security responsibilities between Rackspace and customers per ISO 27017 and service agreements. Documented in Service Order + MSA + Product Terms.

name: Community Engagement Program Controls
description: Rackspace Foundation community engagement since 2008. Employee volunteer programs. Corporate philanthropy governance. Impact measurement.

name: Delegation of Authority Matrix Controls
description: Documented delegation of authority for financial, contractual, and operational decisions. Approval thresholds by role/level. Controls on delegation chain.
